data.card_name: Capital One Venture Rewards Credit Card
data.rewards_program_description: Earn unlimited 2X miles on all purchases. Earn 5X miles on hotels, vacation rentals, and rental cars booked through Capital One Travel. Earn 5X miles on Capital One Entertainment purchases (through 12/31/25).
data.rewards_expiration_detail: Miles don't expire while account is open and in good standing. Miles are forfeited if account is closed.
data.rewards_redemption_options: Miles can be redeemed through Capital One Travel portal, transferred to 15+ travel loyalty programs, or redeemed for past travel purchases at 1 cent per mile.

benefits.benefit_description: Global Entry or TSA PreCheck credit (once every 4 years)
Access to Capital One Dining and Entertainment platforms

incentives.incentive_description: 75,000 bonus miles after spending $4,000 in first 3 months
$250 Capital One Travel credit valid for first cardholder year
